item.title: Virginia Consumer Data Protection Act
item.description: Josephine Lamp presented on the new data privacy law that is pending in Virginia (it still needs a few steps including expected signing by governor, but likely to go into effect Jan 1, 2023): Slides (PDF) This article provides a summary of the law: Virginia Passes Consumer Privacy Law; Other States May Follow, National Law Review, 17 February 2021. The law itself is here: SB 1392: Consumer Data Protection Act
